short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the russia in lowercase in the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Russia to russia Converter is a simple but powerful Chrome extension that automatically changes the word "Russia" to "russia" on all websites. Whether you're tired of inconsistent capitalization or simply prefer a more uniform look to your online content, this extension can save you time and effort in manually editing text.

With the Russia to russia Converter, you can enjoy a more consistent and polished browsing experience, free from distractions caused by inconsistent capitalization.
So why settle for inconsistent capitalization when you can streamline your browsing experience with the Russia to russia Converter? Download this free extension today and enjoy a more polished and professional look to your online content.
